name: squoosh-kit
description: Per-feature adapters around Squoosh codecs (Bun-first), worker/client runtimes.
author: Bartosz Nowak <bnowak008@gmail.com>

scripts.build: bun --filter @squoosh-kit/runtime build && bun --filter '{@squoosh-kit/webp,@squoosh-kit/resize}' build && bun --filter @squoosh-kit/core build && bun --filter '@squoosh-kit/example' build
scripts.clean: bun run --filter "@squoosh-kit/*" clean:local && rm -rf node_modules .bun/install/cache bun.lockb
scripts.validate: bun run check-types && bun run lint && bun run format:check && bun run test
